title: La petite Provence
description:
La petite Provence offers accommodations in Bormes-les-Mimosas, 3.2 miles from La Favière and 14 miles from Villa Noailles Art Centre. The property is around 18 miles from Le Pont des Fées, 25 miles from Toulon Train Station, and 25 miles from Zénith Oméga Toulon. Free Wifi is available throughout the property and Chateau de Grimaud is 18 miles away.

The apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Penitents Chapel is 18 miles from the apartment, while Port Grimaud is 19 miles from the property. Toulon - Hyeres Airport is 14 miles away.

availability.bed_configuration: Bedroom 1: 1 full bed Living room: 1 sofa bed

top_reviews.review: The little touches to make the accomodations even more pleasurable and attractive abounded. Very caring owners. And the location in the heart of this exquisite medieval village couldn't have been better. We'll be back. Some of us Americans will never get used to European showers.

Carine our host was exceptional. She was extremely accommodating  and fully stocked the flat brand with new soaps, lots of coffee, paper towels, and toilet paper for our “entire stay”. which is very unusual and SO appreciated! 
Taller husbands have complained about the lower ceiling and bumping their heads in the upper part of the flat. But my husband isn’t tall and he bumped his head 5 times! I never bumped my head once and I’m taller than him!  Ive come to realize, it’s a “man thing”. 
We couldn’t have had a better stay. Thank you so much Carine. You have a gem of a flat. The location is amazing. The parking was easy, and it was so quiet at night. We would love stay again!
Tout est beau l appartement est tres jolie le village aussi nombreux petit commerce et restaurant

Alloggio incantevole in posizione perfetta per chi ama o vuole conoscere una certa Costa Azzurra che ha più il sapore della Provenza. Mi è piaciuto tutto. Sapevo che i soffitti erano bassi in alcuni punti, ma se cerchi fascino ci sono per forza cose atipiche.
Attenzione però al parcheggio.
È molto complicato in tutta Bormes e il parcheggio centrale è molto caro.
Posizione centralissima, alloggio in tipico stile provenzale dal gusto caldo e accogliente, host sempre reperibile e molto disponibile, consigli preziosissimi su mare e spiagge nei dintorni -

Joli petit appartement, très fonctionnel. L'hôte a fait preuve d'une grande gentillesse, sensible à notre bien-être. Un grand merci pour toutes ses attentions. Un peu de bruit tôt le matin avec les employés communaux qui nettoient la voirie tous les matins (5h30-6h).

Merci pour l'accueil , maison très chaleureuse et confortable superbe emplacement. 
Je vous dit à très bientôt
Locatie midden in het dorp aan de belangrijkste straat met veel winkels De plafondhoogte is ook door de zware houten balken beperkt. Oppassen om niet hoofd te stoten

Appartamento molto accogliente e caratteristico. Si trova in centro al paese. D'estate la via principale è pedonale. Posteggio a pagamento o libero a circa 500 metri dall'abitazione. Ottima accoglienza e disponibilità da parte della proprietaria. Al nostro arrivo una buona bottiglia di vino rosé come benvenuto. Consigliato. il soffitto in camera era un po' basso (1,80 m circa).

La proprietaria molto disponibile e gentile, ci ha dato un sacco di suggerimenti per i posti da visitare. La struttura accogliente, il soffitto un po' basso e si deve stare attenti a non sbatterci, ma ci si abitua in fretta. Appartamento dotato di tutto il necessario per cucinare, pulire, farsi la doccia, oltre a 2 ventilatori. WiFi top, funziona molto bene. Posizione ottima nel centro storico del paesino e in auto si raggiungono bene tutte le principali mete della Costa Azzurra. Per andare al mare, spiagge bellissime a 15 - 20 minuti di macchina. L'appartamento era molto pulito e ben tenuto, con uno spiccato gusto rustico nell'arredamento. Sicuramente lo consiglio! In agosto la mancanza di aria condizionata si fa sentire, essendo il soffitto molto basso. I ventilatori compensano comunque e rendono l'appartamento più che vivibile.

property_information:
Lovely accomodation for 2 in the heart of Bormes les Mimosas, among the restaurants and small shops. 

 WIFI and flat TV.
Access from outside for this accomodation with very cosy atmosphere. 

Be aware that bedroom and shower are 180 cm height! 
Kitchen and the rest of the flat have normal height under ceiling. 
Perfect for a couple :)

property_information:
Just an 8-minute walk from the fine sand and crystal-clear waters of the Mediterranean, this modern 50 m² apartment is the ideal place to fully enjoy the seaside. Located in La Favière, one of the most sought-after neighborhoods in Bormes-les-Mimosas, it offers quick access to the beach while enjoying a pleasant setting.

The apartment consists of a bedroom with a high-quality double bed and a living room equipped with a comfortable sofa bed that can accommodate two additional guests. It also has a bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen for easy meal preparation. For your comfort, air conditioning ensures a pleasant temperature all year round, and a washing machine is available. A smart TV with access to Netflix and Canal+ is featured in the living room and bedroom, and high-speed Wi-Fi allows you to stay connected at all times.
The outdoor area includes a private covered terrace, ideal for enjoying al fresco dining or relaxing after a day at the beach. A plancha grill is available for cozy evenings. The apartment is located in a building with an elevator and benefits from a private parking space. A pétanque court within the residence makes it easy to extend the summer atmosphere.
The apartment is non-smoking and pets are not accepted. With its exceptional location just a few steps from the sea and its modern comfort, it is the ideal accommodation for a peaceful stay on the Côte d'Azur. With Holidu you can easily find your perfect vacation rental. A cozy apartment on Lake Constance? A dreamlike country house in Mallorca or a snug chalet in the Alps? To offer you a relaxing stay in Europe's most beautiful regions, we focus on working with certified homeowners, whose rentals meet our high quality criteria. In addition to focusing on quality, we offer a customer service that supports you quickly and straightforwardly with all questions and concerns seven days a week. In addition to its immediate proximity to the beach, the apartment is just a few minutes from shops, restaurants and summer entertainment. Everything can be done on foot, without having to take the car. Bormes-les-Mimosas also offers many possibilities for excursions, in particular to the Golden Islands, Fort de Brégançon or the medieval hilltop village of Bormes.

title: Auberge du Dom
description:
Offering a garden, Auberge du Dom offers accommodations in Bormes-les-Mimosas. This property offers a pool with a view and free private parking. Guests can use the hot tub or enjoy garden views.

All units feature air conditioning and a satellite flat-screen TV. Rooms come with a kettle, a private bathroom, and free Wifi, while some rooms also feature a terrace and some have pool views. At the bed and breakfast, units come with bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruit, and juice are available for the continental breakfast.

Chateau de Grimaud is 15 miles from the bed and breakfast, while Le Pont des Fées is 15 miles from the property. Toulon - Hyeres Airport is 13 miles away.

top_reviews.review: Breakfast was great, served outdoors. Room was more like a small apartment with private terrace than merely a room. Grounds were lovely but not quite ready for the start of the season (we were there at the end of May.) Like other parts of the large grounds, the pool could have used a cleaning.

The facilities are outstanding, and Cati, the owner, even more so. Very modern and beautifully decorated. We arrived late and the local restaurant was closed so Cati insisted on fixing us a plate for dinner, complete with a glass of port! Next day, breakfast delivered to the room. We were made to feel like part of the family. Located near the end of the "wine route" along rt98 from St. Tropez. Great place to stay after visiting the vineyards along the way. This will become an annual event!
It was perfect. The host was excellent and looked after us from the moment we arrived to the time we left. I cannot praise the establishment enough. It was perfect
An amazing place. Customer service was excellent, facilities superb and breakfast was delicious. Nothing
Cadre, le personnel c’est une faille qui tiens l’auberge super décontracté , c’est l’idée
Établissement magnifique autant au niveau du décor que du cadre.  Très calme.  Petit déjeuner copieux.  Patron d'une gentillesse.  Je le conseille et reviendrai avec plaisir. Rien
Très belle auberge avec une superbe vue sur la piscine. Chambre décorée avec soin. Endroit calme.grand  Parking fermé la nuit. Très belle Piscine avec transats autour.

Le personnel et le patron très sympas,l’emplacement retiré et calme ,la chambre spacieuse,la piscine top,le p’tit dej où il ne manque rien …… Rien
Un posto magico in mezzo alla natura e al silenzio. Ideale per un viaggio di coppia. Il bagno non è diviso dalla camera con una porta.

Le Pin d'Alep enjoys a location in Bormes-les-Mimosas, 20 miles from Chateau de Grimaud and 20 miles from Le Pont des Fées. This property offers access to a terrace and free private parking. Guests can make use of the children's playground or the picnic area, or enjoy views of the mountain and garden.

Accessible via private entrance, all rooms have air conditioning, soundproofing, desk, and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. The bed and breakfast features some units with pool views, and all units come with a kettle. At the bed and breakfast, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast, and breakfast in the room is also available.

Le Pin d'Alep also offers an outdoor swimming pool and a hot tub for guests to relax in. top_reviews.review: The owner and the „concièrge“ were extremely friendly and kind. Very quick communication. Magical place with a breathtaking vue. One of the most beautiful places I have ever seen. Super modern and the interior is high quality. We will be back for sure ☺️

Traumhafte Lage mit wunderbarem Ausblick auf das Meer und die Küste. Ein kleines Paradies. Es fehlt an nichts für einen tollen Familienurlaub. Ausgesprochen netter und unkomplizierter Kontakt mit dem Eigentümer und der Concierge vor Ort. Wir kommen sehr gerne wieder.

There are two separate comfortable houses (one with 3 bedrooms/2 bathrooms and one with 4 bedrooms/2 bathrooms) with a lovely connecting outdoor socialising area. The villa is at the top of Cap Benat with amazing views, a great pool, comfortable rooms and responsive concierge and access to lovely walks and private beaches. The smaller house is not as well equipped as the larger house - for example there was no kettle and the wifi and TV did not work well.  Information about how the appliances worked would have been useful. There is no air conditioning in the living area of either house and in the larger house the bedroom air con did not work between 4am-4pm. The two bedrooms on the swimming pool level were not great - one was very damp and musty and the other had the noise of the running pool equipment and no window coverings in either of these rooms - we thankfully did not need these extra rooms for our group for more than one night.

title: Boulevard du Soleil
description:
Boulevard du Soleil is located in Bormes-les-Mimosas, just 18 miles from Chateau de Grimaud and 18 miles from Le Pont des Fées. Both free Wifi and private parking are available at the apartment free of charge. Toulon Train Station is 24 miles from the apartment and Zénith Oméga Toulon is 25 miles away.

Providing sea views, this apartment also offers a flat-screen TV, a well-equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven, and a microwave, as well as 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. The accommodation is non-smoking.

La Favière is 3 miles from Boulevard du Soleil, while Villa Noailles Art Centre is 14 miles away. Toulon - Hyeres Airport is 13 miles from the property.

availability.bed_configuration: 1 full bed

top_reviews.review: This apartment is absolutely perfect for a couple or one person. It is very well equipped with a great kitchen. The bathroom is tidy with a fantastic shower and everything is well organized. There is a balcony with sweeping views of the hills here in Bormes Les Mimosas, which is close to beaches and shopping. The host is just lovely. This stay has been the absolute highlight of my trip to the south of France. The parking is just below the apartment as well. Thank you!

Stunning views from this compact and well designed bijou apartment. Private parking was fabulous, lovely comfortable bed and just enough room to sit on the balcony and enjoy the view. Our host was extremely helpful. Highly recommended.
Amazing views, comfortable, great communication from the host, perfect location. This was the second time I have stayed at this lovely apartment. Rien

The apartment in the heart of Bormes-les-Mimosas was super cozy and easily accessible. The host was very friendly and communicated clearly with us. She also sent us nice locations and beaches, so we were well informed about the great spots. We definitely want to come back because we enjoyed it so much. A big 10 out of 10 for this apartment!

This was the best accommodation we had in 2 weeks! An amazingly beautiful  apartment, the bed so comfy and the kitchen well equipped. The view from the balcony is wonderful. You just feel so well looked after. And it is so convenient to have private parking. Carine is the most caring and lovely host, we have ever encountered! She  cares a lot and that makes the stay very special. We will be back! Everything was fabulous.

Apartments with parking are rarely available in the village quarter of Bormes-les-Mimosas. This apartment is an exceptional case. It is situated in the end of the village quarter. So I could access the village centre easily by walk but keep the room free from various noises.  Furthermore I loved the kitchen, which is small but well equipped. Everything is carefully maintained.

The appartement is superb. Very well decorated with all the amenities we can except and even more ! The view from the balcony is amazing. The location of the appartement is perfect, next to the old town of Bormes les Mimosas which is great for some evening wandering. We really like our stay in this appartement. Thanks again to the owner Maybe a fan would have been handy. It was really hot during our stay and we had some difficulties to fall asleep with the heat.

Gute Lage, kurze Wege in die Altstadt und zu Geschäften des täglichen Bedarfs.
Sehr gut ausgestattetes Appartement 
Wie immer, sehr guter Kontakt zur Ansprechpartnerin vor Ort ( Carine)

La gentillesse de Carine, ses attentions et ses conseils pour passer un super séjour.
L'emplacement du studio, à 5 minutes à pied du centre du village, avec le parking qui est un gros plus. Les différentes vues très agréables depuis les 2 fenêtres.
Le studio en lui-même, joliment décoré et avec tous les équipements nécessaires.
On s'y sent chez soi à peine arrivé ! Le bruit des véhicules qui passent juste sous la fenêtre, mais ça va de pair avec l'emplacement central et n'est pas dérangeant plus que ça, en comparaison avec tous les points positifs.
Très confortable, et super bien placé, on est au cœur de Bormes-les-Mimosas, à cinq minutes, des plages du Lavandou, l’appart’ est très calme, et très ensoleillé, un jour de rêve…

property_information:
I've falled in love with this apartment for its beautiful view over the old village of Bormes les Mimosas and its private car park. 
In April 2018, I renewed it with travertine floor tile, a new fully equipped kitchen, shower room. Nice decoration and frames have been chosen for this lovely place.
I chose and renovated this apartment especially for you and I look forward to welcoming you soon. My wish is you to have very enjoyable holiday with a nice accomadation and plenty of ideas to enjoy the area! Leave the car on the car park and discover by walking the beautiful old village. Bakery with fresh bread and croissants, pizza and chicken, restaurants, the post and the park Le Cigalou are in the same street!

property_information:
In the heart of the Favière, spend your holidays in this beautiful two-room up to 4 people and its large 60 m ² exterior, perfect for enjoying the Mediterranean sun!

The Apartment
Cosy and coquettish, it offers a beautiful living room with a kitchen dining area and is extended by the living room with a convertible sofa. It opens onto a large terrace and its vast garden exposed south. The night corner consists of a room with two twin beds also overlooking outside. A bathroom with toilets completes the apartment.

You would like :
- Its large outside exposed South
- Its premium equipment

The residence
Modernity and design is the promise of this new residence Le Poseidon. Everything has been studied for exceptional holidays. The proximity from the beach or its swimming pool (Open from 01/04 to 31/10) this is the ideal place for a relaxing moment. Fully secure, it also offers individual car park boxes for your vehicle.

Good to know!
Our pets friends are allowed in this accommodation (with a supplement per stay (off-season, per week in high season) and per pet).
Keys have to be collected at the agency in Bormes-les-mimosas. SELECT'soHOME, your holiday rental agency in Bormes-les-mimosas

SELECT'soHOME concept is the new combination of luxury vacation rentals with hotel services ! Enjoy premium amenities and services included for and enjoy your holiday like if you were at the hotel : personalized welcome, beds prepared for arrival & linen of house, Start-of-stay kit, WIFI, Nespresso coffee maker, TV 4K,... But also many extras « à la carte » to enhance your stay and enjoy your holidays : Plancha, paddle, snorkeling kit, baby equipment (bed, bathtub, high chair)... La Favière in Bormes Les Mimosas
Enjoy a location in the heart of the seaside resort of la Favière. Just a few steps from the Beach and the harbour, enjoy many shops, restaurants, bars and as well many summer activities. A family atmosphere that will delight young and old. It is also the ideal starting point to visit the Var, its landscapes, its golden islands and the St Tropez Gulf!

top_reviews.review: Clean, modern housing, washing machine, coffee machine, dishwasher, two showers, there's little to nothing to be moaning about. Garage driving passages are very narrow, no single-key-solition for all entries provided, so you basically have to fetch a whole bunch of keys.

Parfait ! Rien à redire. 
La cuisine est parfaitement équipée, il ne manque rien.
Kit d’accueil très appréciable.
Résidence très calme Le box trop petit pour notre voiture (scénic), ce qui n’est pas un problème en soi normalement puisque nous avions un parking extérieur réservé à la résidence mais … occupé par les résidents des maisons/appartements des autres résidences.
La piscine / la climatisation / les deux salles de bain Dommage la terrasse en plein soleil sans parasol en pleine canicule

- Saubere, praktisch, modern und neuwertig eingerichtete Wohneinheit
- Bequeme, neue Betten (wir mögen eher härtere Matratzen, diese waren für uns perfekt). Auch das Bettsofa war sehr bequem
- Grosse und praktisch eingerichtete Terrasse
- Gut eingerichtete Küche
- Sicherer Abstellplatz fürs Auto
- Eingezäunte Wohnanlage vermittelt Sicherheit
- Gut zu erreichender, sauberer Pool
- In 12 Minuten zu Fuss am Strand von La Favière
- Kleiner Laden für die wichtigsten Besorgungen in 5‘ zu Fuss zu erreichen
- Freundliches und hilfsbereites Personal in der Agentur. Wir bemängelten die Sauberkeit einer Decke und bekamen sofort Ersatz geliefert in Form einer nigelnagelneuen Bettdecke - Innerhalb der Wohneinheit sind die Zimmer sehr ringhörig. 
- Die Wohnung ist eher konzipiert für eine vierköpfige Familie, die in zwei Zimmern schläft, da sich die Duschen und Waschbecken in den Schlafzimmern selbst befinden. Zwischen den Schlafzimmern hat es eine Toilette ohne Waschbecken. Wer also auf dem Sofabett schläft, muss sich fürs Händewaschen, Zähneputzen und Duschen in die Schlafzimmer begeben… oder man benutzt die Spüle in der Küche…

situation géographique idéale, météo clémente. grand logement moderne Caution de 700 euros fort élevée. Nous n'avons trouvé l'inventaire détaillé dans le tiroir que plusieurs jours après notre arrivée. Il manque une poubelle dans les WC.
Très joli cadre, chambre familiale lodge très  spacieuse et confortable, personnel hyper agréable.  Hâte de revenir aux beaux jours pour profiter de la piscine !

la climatisation. Sa proximité de la plage et du centre ville; La disponibilité du personnel de select home. L'absence d'une machine à cfé avec filtre et le manque de casserole pour faire à manger. Pas de récipients pour conserver lmes aliments.

property_information:
When the beach is just a short stroll away and the pool’s waiting downstairs, you know you’re in the right place.

Welcome to La Favière, in the heart of Bormes-les-Mimosas — a sunny escape where everything’s easy, calm and close by. This bright, well-designed duplex is your perfect home base: unpack, unwind and let the holiday rhythm take over.

A bright, clever interior designed for easygoing days

Downstairs, the open living space is all about simplicity and light. You’ll find a fully equipped kitchen, a welcoming dining area, a cosy lounge with a convertible sofa and 4K TV, and a small work nook — just in case inspiration (or a quick email) strikes.
Step outside and you’re on the spacious south-facing terrace, thoughtfully furnished for meals in the sun or lazy afternoons on a lounger. Whether it’s breakfast outdoors or a quiet evening under the sky, this space adds an extra layer of freedom to your stay.
Upstairs, two restful bedrooms keep things calm and comfortable. One features a double bed, the other two singles — ideal for families or friends. Both come with their own private bathroom, and separate toilets make mornings smoother when travelling as a group.

What makes this place stand out:

- A large sunny terrace that invites you to live outdoors
- Two private suites for more space, more comfort
- An ideal layout for 4 to 6 guests, where everyone has room to breathe

Good to know (so you can plan with peace of mind):

- Yes, dogs are welcome (yours will love the terrace too)
- Pet fee: per stay (off-season) or per week (summer)
- Private underground parking included
- Key pickup at the SELECT’soHOME agency in Bormes-les-Mimosas SELECT’soHOME: the freedom of a rental, the ease of a hotel

Your holiday starts the moment you arrive: beds are made, linens are ready, cleaning is included, and we welcome you personally. Want to add a little something extra? We offer à-la-carte options like a plancha grill, paddle board, baby gear, snorkeling kit and more. Everything’s set so you can enjoy your stay from the very first moment. Le Poseidon residence: calm, comfort and clean lines

Brand new and thoughtfully designed, Le Poseidon is a secure, peaceful complex with contemporary architecture and a welcoming atmosphere. The outdoor pool (open April through October) is perfect for a refreshing dip after a beach day. You’ll also have a private underground parking space — once you park, you might not need the car again.

La Favière: seaside charm with everything close at hand

Here, it’s all walkable: beach, harbour, shops, cafés, local markets… The vibe is friendly and relaxed, just as a seaside holiday should be. In summer, the area comes alive with colour, evening strolls, and plenty to do for all ages. Looking for adventure? The Golden Isles, coastal trails and even Saint-Tropez are within easy reach.

La piscine et le fait de pouvoir prendre mes chiens Le bruit de certains tuyaux ou VMC et il manque une petite déco dans le hall d entrée

Appartement très fonctionnel, propre, bien décoré avec un  box dans parking. 
Les dames de l'agence, à l'accueil sont sympas

Nous recommandons cet appartement.

Petit appartement tout neuf, très clair, très bien équipé, parfaitement propre, à un prix très doux (du moins en cette saison). Lit king size, confortable + canapé convertible. Le quartier est sans intérêt, mais le vieux village de Bormes se trouve à cinq minutes en voiture, de même que plusieurs supermarchés. Agréable terrasse. Garage couvert et fermé. Une piscine... où on a préféré ne pas se tremper fin février-début mars ! Très agréable Merci au personnel de l’accueil d’avoir attendu notre arrivée bien au-delà de l’heure de fermeture du bureau... Tout était parfait.
Superbe appartement très bien équipé et très bien situé,  proche de la mer et des commerces
Appartement moderne et fonctionnel, avec une belle piscine. Le seul point négatif, s’il faut en trouver un, est la distance par rapport au centre de la Favière.
